description: This file contains Python code for generating C++ header and source files based on a JSON schema describing a JSON-RPC interface. It includes functions to create API headers, generate classes, enums, version information, and stubs for JSON-RPC, using emitters to write code files and logging for progress reporting.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining JSON-RPC API functions and includes, based on provided headers list and source information.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that parses a JSON schema for a JSON-RPC interface and generates corresponding C++ code files for classes, enums, version info, and RPC stubs, depending on configuration flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
